short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No More 404 is a helpful tool that allows users to avoid http errors and review website performance data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension transforms ordinary errors into a useful webpage that gives your more information about what's wrong with the URL you tried to visit and gives you an interface powered by Yahoo to move forward.
Also, the extension shows some essential data about the pages, such as loading speed and other performance metrics.
We don't store nor share any personal data.
